title: Breaking Points FIRST SHOW: Dems Screwed In 2022? Facebook's Trump Ban And NYC's Crazy Mayoral Race ft Glenn Greenwald

itunes:title: Breaking Points FIRST SHOW: Dems Screwed In 2022? Facebook's Trump Ban And NYC's Crazy Mayoral Race ft Glenn Greenwald
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar debut Breaking points with Krystal and Saagar. They cover the lab leak hypothesis, culture war distractions, Trump's Facebook ban, the NYC Mayoral race, and what the show is all about.
